scripts.start: next build && NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 next start 2> stderr
scripts.nginx: docker build --quiet -t next-server-action-redirect-issue --build-arg MY_DOCKER_HOST=${MY_DOCKER_HOST:-host.docker.internal} . && docker run -p 443:443 --rm next-server-action-redirect-issue
scripts.test:run: START_SERVER_AND_TEST_INSECURE=1 start-server-and-test start 3000 nginx https://localhost test:playwright
scripts.test: npm run test:run && test -s stderr && cat stderr && exit 1 || exit 0
